name: TairaGames Gamejam: Haxxor Edition
description:
Hi guys, it's Vivraan#3529.

Seeing as this is an unpackaged release, you'll need Unreal Engine 4.18 to build the files and play from editor/standalone mode.

The game is also available on GitLab, for those who wish to contribute to it in some unexpected moment in the future. You'll need to request access since it's private.

I'll also give a cookie to whoever solves the weird glitch when you package the game.

Warning: the code and content inside the Original Gamejam Submission version may give you nightmares if you're an experienced game developer.
